sn22.90:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula thera bhikkhu baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye.
sn22.90:1.2: Atha kho ayasma channo sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito avapuranam adaya viharena viharam upasankamitva there bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn22.90:1.3: “ovadantu mam ayasmanto thera, anusasantu mam ayasmanto thera, karontu me ayasmanto thera dhammim katham, yathaham dhammam passeyyan”ti.
sn22.90:2.1: Evam vutte, thera bhikkhu ayasmantam channam etadavocum:
sn22.90:3.11: Sabbe sankhara anicca, sabbe dhamma anatta’ti.
sn22.90:3.12: Atha ca pana me sabbasankharasamathe sabbupadhipatinissagge tanhakkhaye virage nirodhe nibbane cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati nadhimuccati.
sn22.90:3.16: Na kho panevam dhammam passato hoti.
sn22.90:3.17: Ko nu kho me tatha dhammam deseyya yathaham dhammam passeyyan”ti.
sn22.90:4.2: “ayam kho ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam, pahoti ca me ayasma anando tatha dhammam desetum yathaham dhammam passeyyam;
sn22.90:4.3: atthi ca me ayasmante anande tavatika vissatthi.
sn22.90:4.5: Atha kho ayasma channo senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya yena kosambi ghositaramo yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodi …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma channo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn22.90:5.1: “Ekamidaham, avuso ananda, samayam baranasiyam viharami isipatane migadaye.
sn22.90:5.2: Atha khvaham, avuso, sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito avapuranam adaya viharena viharam upasankamim;
sn22.90:5.4: ‘ovadantu mam ayasmanto thera, anusasantu mam ayasmanto thera, karontu me ayasmanto thera dhammim katham yathaham dhammam passeyyan’ti.
sn22.90:5.5: Evam vutte, mam, avuso, thera bhikkhu etadavocum:
sn22.90:5.13: Sabbe sankhara anicca, sabbe dhamma anatta’ti.
sn22.90:6.8: Sabbe sankhara anicca, sabbe dhamma anatta’ti.
sn22.90:6.9: Atha ca pana me sabbasankharasamathe sabbupadhipatinissagge tanhakkhaye virage nirodhe nibbane cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati nadhimuccati.
sn22.90:6.13: Na kho panevam dhammam passato hoti.
sn22.90:6.14: Ko nu kho me tatha dhammam deseyya yathaham dhammam passeyyanti.
sn22.90:7.2: ‘ayam kho ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam, pahoti ca me ayasma anando tatha dhammam desetum yathaham dhammam passeyyam.
sn22.90:7.3: Atthi ca me ayasmante anande tavatika vissatthi.
sn22.90:7.7: karotu me, ayasma anando dhammim katham yathaham dhammam passeyyan”ti.
sn22.90:8.1: “Ettakenapi mayam ayasmato channassa attamana api nama tam ayasma channo avi akasi khilam chindi.
sn22.90:8.4: Atha kho ayasmato channassa tavatakeneva ularam pitipamojjam uppajji:
sn22.90:9.1: “Sammukha metam, avuso channa, bhagavato sutam, sammukha patiggahitam kaccanagottam bhikkhum ovadantassa—
sn22.90:9.2: dvayanissito khvayam, kaccana, loko yebhuyyena atthitanceva natthitanca.
sn22.90:9.3: Lokasamudayam kho, kaccana, yathabhutam sammappannaya passato ya loke natthita, sa na hoti.
sn22.90:9.4: Lokanirodham kho, kaccana, yathabhutam sammappannaya passato ya loke atthita, sa na hoti.
sn22.90:9.6: tam cayam upayupadanam cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusayam na upeti na upadiyati nadhitthati ‘atta me’ti.
sn22.90:9.7: Dukkhameva uppajjamanam uppajjati, dukkham nirujjhamanam nirujjhatiti na kankhati na vicikicchati.
sn22.90:9.12: Ete te, kaccana, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti—
sn22.90:10.1: “Evametam, avuso ananda, hoti yesam ayasmantanam tadisa sabrahmacarayo anukampaka atthakama ovadaka anusasaka.
sn22.90:10.2: Idanca pana me ayasmato anandassa dhammadesanam sutva dhammo abhisamito”ti.
